price: Sema: Ni ya nani ardhi na viliomo ndani yake, kama nyinyi mnajua?
arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Waambie: Ni nani aliye imiliki ardhi na viliomo ndani yake, tangu watu mpaka viumbe vyote? Kama nyinyi mna ujuzi nijibuni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul limani al-arḍu waman fīhā in kuntum taʿlamūna
